name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lingocloud: Web Translation, Video Translation, AI Reading Assistant
name.zh_CN: 彩云小译：网页翻译，划词翻译，视频翻译，AI阅读助手

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI translation extension for everyone, providing the ultimate bilingual webpage translation experience. The best AI translation tool
short.zh_CN: 都在用的AI翻译插件，双语对照网页翻译，视频翻译，AI阅读助手，浏览器翻译插件最佳方式

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This update addresses reported issues and further optimizes performance and features to ensure a smoother experience. Thank you for your support!

Travel the world in your native language with Lingocloud AI, effortlessly rebuilding the Tower of Babel, 🌍✨ breaking language barriers, and opening the door to a new world! Whether you're a beginner or a language expert, Lingocloud AI provides you with the ultimate foreign language reading experience. Powered by the Lingocloud AI translation model, combining bilingual web page translation, word-by-word translation, AI reading assistant, and a comprehensive glossary library, you can read academic journals, novels, or news in your native language without barriers.

If you feel your foreign language skills are limited, Lingocloud AI helps you break through language walls; if you're proficient, Lingocloud AI speeds up your reading, allowing you to gather more foreign content in the same amount of time. 🎓📖 Lingocloud AI is the perfect AI tool for reading, learning, research, and travel.

Features:

1. Bilingual Web Page Translation: 🌐 When browsing a website, simply click the "Lingocloud icon," and the page will switch to a "bilingual mode." Whether you're a beginner or an expert, you'll easily navigate vast foreign web content.

2. Word-by-Word Translation: 🖱️ While browsing foreign websites, select any text, and you'll get an instant translation. Foreign content is now at your fingertips.

3. Video Translation: 🎥 While watching web videos, click the "Video Translation Button" to generate real-time bilingual subtitles. Learn as you watch and easily enjoy foreign-language videos.

4. AI Reading Assistant: 🤖 Lingocloud AI offers conversational Q&A, helping you quickly grasp complex foreign content, making global exploration easier.

5. Glossary: 📚 Lingocloud AI includes a built-in glossary library of 100,000+ specialized terms, and supports custom libraries, ensuring accurate translation of professional terminology and personalized expressions.

6. PDF Translation: 📄 Automatically detects PDF file links, offering one-click translation while retaining the document's original format for easy foreign PDF reading.

Explore a bigger world with Lingocloud AI !  🌟

Notes:

Permissions: 🔒 To properly use word-by-word translation, automatic translation, and video translation features, please allow Lingocloud translate to read and modify data on the websites you visit. Video translation requires sharing the current tab's audio when activated.

Feedback: 💌 If you have any questions, suggestions, or feedback, feel free to visit our feedback page to share your thoughts with us! Visit https://support.qq.com/products/107129/
long.zh_CN:
本次更新继续修复了大家反馈的问题，并对应用的性能和功能进行了进一步优化，力求为您带来更流畅的使用体验。感谢您的支持！

用母语畅游全球，彩云小译助你轻松重建巴别塔，🌍✨冲破语言障碍，开启全新世界大门！无论你是语言初学者还是外语达人，彩云小译都能为你提供极致的外文阅读体验。依托小译AI翻译模型，结合双语对照网页翻译、划词翻译、AI阅读助手、术语库功能，无论是学术期刊、小说还是资讯，皆可用母语无障碍阅读。

如果你觉得外语水平有限，彩云小译为你打破语言壁垒；如果你外语水平不错，彩云小译帮你加速阅读，在同样的时间内获取更多有趣的外文信息。🎓📖彩云小译是您绝佳的看文、学习、科研、出行必备AI工具。

功能介绍：

1、双语对照网页翻译： 🌐 浏览网页时，只需点击「彩云小译图标」，网页将呈现为“双语对照”形式，海量外文网页一键掌握，哪怕是外语初学者，也能轻松畅游全球内容。

2、划词翻译： 🖱️ 在浏览外语网页时，选中任何文本划词即译，外语世界触手可及。

3、视频翻译： 🎥 浏览网页视频时，点击「视频翻译按钮」，即可生成实时双语字幕，边看边学，轻松观看外语视频内容。

4、AI阅读助手： 🤖  和小译AI对话式问答，助你快速总结理解复杂网页内容，探索世界变得更加简单。

5、术语库： 📚 彩云小译内置超过10万条术语，涵盖多个领域，支持自定义术语库，专业术语翻译准确无误，支持翻译个性表达。

6、PDF翻译： 📄 自动识别PDF文件链接，一键翻译，保留文档原格式，轻松阅读外文PDF文档。

与彩云小译一起，探索更大的世界吧！🌟

提示：

关于权限： 🔒 为了正常使用划词翻译、自动翻译和视频翻译功能，请允许彩云小译读取并更改您访问的网页数据。视频翻译功能需要在启用时共享当前标签页音频给插件。
意见反馈： 💌 如有任何问题、建议或意见，欢迎访问反馈页面与我们分享您的想法！请到 https://support.qq.com/products/107129/
